title: The First Christmas
creator_credit: Lindsay Van Blerk and XYZOO Animation
brief_description: Christopher Plummer narrates this delightful clay animation version of the story of the birth of Christ. Features traditional carols such as “Silent night”, “We three kings”, “O Come all ye faithful”, “O Little town of Bethlehem”, and “Joy to the world”. (Awards: Winner 1999 Andrew Carnegie Medal for Excellence in Children’s video)
